title: Fortune favors the brave: How those who took the risk at the Tour de France Femmes were rewarded
content:
From breakaways to break-outs, Yara Kastelijin, Julie Van de Velde, Ricarda Bauernfeind, Emma Norsgaard, and Kasia Niewiadoma benefit from boldness.

Read the full article at Fortune favors the brave: How those who took the risk at the Tour de France Femmes were rewarded on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
